message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $95 is a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider $85?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $85 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $87?
